backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister with an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two homepage AdSense placement features and their related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of major frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and config.
frontend/.env.example: Environment variable template for configuring AdSense client and ad slot IDs.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with finance‑themed color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry that conditionally injects the AdSense script using Vite environment variables.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps HomePage in ThemeProvider and includes global Toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSenseAd.ts: Reusable AdSense ad component that initializes ads, checks configuration, and provides fallbacks.
frontend/src/config/adsense.ts: Centralized module exposing AdSense client and slot IDs along with config and availability helpers.
frontend/src/features/compare/components: Currency conversion widget allowing amount entry and multi-currency comparisons using provided rates.
UI panel letting users pick up to three currencies to compare, validating selections and showing comparison widgets.
frontend/src/features/compare/lib/conver: Provides a utility function to convert currency amounts using rates relative to a base currency.
frontend/src/features/rates/api/exchange: Fetches latest exchange rates and available currencies from the Frankfurter API.
frontend/src/features/rates/api/historic: Retrieves and normalizes historical exchange rate data for a currency pair over a date range.
frontend/src/features/rates/components/B: Dropdown component for choosing a base currency from available options.
frontend/src/features/rates/components/D: Renders quick-select buttons for predefined historical date ranges.
frontend/src/features/rates/components/H: Generates an SVG line and area chart for historical exchange rate data.
Panel showing historical rate chart, range presets, refresh controls, and error/loading states.
frontend/src/features/rates/components/R: Searchable, sortable table of exchange rates with error and loading handling.
Toolbar displaying last updated timestamp and a refresh button for rates.
frontend/src/features/rates/currencyMeta: Defines a map of currency codes to display names and a helper to retrieve a name or fallback code.
frontend/src/features/rates/hooks/useHis: React Query hook that fetches historical exchange rates based on a date range preset.
frontend/src/features/rates/hooks/useLiv: React Query hook for fetching and auto‑refreshing live exchange rates for a base currency.
frontend/src/features/rates/lib/dateRang: Provides date range presets, utilities to compute ISO date ranges, and preset labels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for backend-specific React Query hooks; currently unused.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing live rates, controls, ads, and optional historical charts.
frontend/src/types/adsense.d.ts: Type declaration for the global AdSense window object.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with theme extensions, color variables, plugins, and container settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, architectural notes, and a list of implemented features for the CurrencyPal app. Tracks version, planned domain setup, AdSense plans, and existing requirements.
